org.nmdp.ngs.hml

Class HmlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nmdp.ngs.hml.HmlUtils

  • public final class HmlUtils
extends Object
    Static utility methods for creating HML model classes.

      • createSequence

        public static Sequence createSequence(org.biojava.bio.seq.Sequence sequence)
        Create and return a new HML Sequence from the specified sequence.
        Parameters:
        sequence - sequence, must not be null, and alphabet must be one of { DNA, RNA }
        Returns:
        a new HML Sequence created from the specified sequence.

      • createSequence

        public static Sequence createSequence(String alphabet,
                      String sequence)
                               throws org.biojava.bio.symbol.IllegalSymbolException
        Create and return a new HML Sequence with the specified alphabet and sequence.
        Parameters:
        alphabet - alphabet, must be one of { DNA, RNA }
        sequence - sequence, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new HML Sequence with the specified alphabet and sequence
        Throws:
        org.biojava.bio.symbol.IllegalSymbolException - if sequence contains an illegal symbol

      • createTargetedRegion

        public static TargetedRegion createTargetedRegion(String assembly,
                                  String contig,
                                  long start,
                                  long end)
        Create and return a new HML TargetedRegion with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        assembly - assembly, must not be null, should be a major or minor version of the GRC human assembly, e.g. GRCh38
        contig - contig, must not be null, should be a contig present in the specified assembly
        start - start, 0-based coordinate system, closed-open range, must be at least 0L
        end - end, 0-based coordinate system, closed-open range, must be at least 0L
        Returns:
        a new HML TargetedRegion with the specified parameters

      • createTargetedRegion

        public static TargetedRegion createTargetedRegion(String assembly,
                                  String contig,
                                  long start,
                                  long end,
                                  String strand,
                                  String id,
                                  String description)
        Create and return a new HML TargetedRegion with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        assembly - assembly, must not be null, should be a major or minor version of the GRC human assembly, e.g. GRCh38
        contig - contig, must not be null, should be a contig present in the specified assembly
        start - start, 0-based coordinate system, closed-open range, must be at least 0L
        end - end, 0-based coordinate system, closed-open range, must be at least 0L
        strand - strand, if provided must be one of { 1, -1, +, - }
        id - id
        description - description
        Returns:
        a new HML TargetedRegion with the specified parameters

      • createTargetedRegion

        public static TargetedRegion createTargetedRegion(String assembly,
                                  Locus locus)
        Create and return a new HML TargetedRegion with the specified assembly and locus.
        Parameters:
        assembly - assembly, must not be null, should be a major or minor version of the GRC human assembly, e.g. GRCh38
        locus - locus, must not be null
        Returns:
        a new HML TargetedRegion with the specified assembly and locus
